docs.snippet: Judge Greg Griffin of Alabama had complained on Facebook of being racially profiled by the police, prompting lawyers defending a white police officer to suggest he step away.

headline.print_headline: Black Judge Refuses to Recuse Himself in Shooting by White Officer
headline.main: Black Judge Refuses to Recuse Himself in Shooting by White Officer

docs.snippet: Surgeon General Vivek H. Murthy was asked to resign by the Trump administration. He has been replaced by his deputy, Rear Adm. Sylvia Trent-Adams.
